ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Soloing bards
ygData.msgSnippet: Heheh - I doubt these people were in beta - (as I wasn t) - but now I have the answer - when someone says When did they nerf that I ll say - back in Beta 3!
ygData.messageBody:
Heheh - I doubt these people were in beta - (as I wasn't) - but now I have
the answer - when someone says "When did they nerf that" I'll say - back in
Beta 3!

Slyde
-----Original Message-----
From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2001 10:19 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Soloing bards

Back in beta 3 hastes did stack. Then some whined about a 10th level bard
double hasting themselves (using anthem and jonthans) and the nerf hammer
came down.

Rokenn
